website_summaries.verdict: A unique, affordable solution for those who want a guest bed and a seating option in tight quarters.
pros: Suitable for smaller spaces: apartments, dorms, cramped quarters
Available in twin and full sizes
cons: Occasional quality concerns reported, such as sagging or poor durability, but most are satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Sleep is uncomfortable because the hip area on the mattress gets sunken in during sleep. I have to move my body to the edges of the mattress to find a firm spot, and multiple times during the night. Good quality materials doesn't equal comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Andy R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to use in my new treehouse that didn't take up much space when not being used as a bed. I like the versatility of using to sit on too. I find it comfortable to both sitting and for using it as a bed. I am using a blanket to cover mine now so it stays new looking without having to wash it so often.
customer_reviews.author: Houndhelper

customer_reviews.title: excellent tri-fold, but very bulky and a bit heavy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mattress. As folding tri-fold mattresses go, its incredibly comfortable. It is bulky because its very thick. But if you lie down over gravel or rough/hard surfaces, you'd not feel a thing. I have bad hips and I'm large so I need alot of cushioning. This does the trick! Its not firm enough to use as a chair however, so I wish they'd not bother with the extra hinged pillow option.
customer_reviews.author: Angela D.

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect, Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY downside about this so far is that the small strap for securing the foldable pillow upright is the soft velcro side, while both sides of the mattress have the toothy velcro side facing outward; but you can only cover one at a time. It's fine when it's being used as a chair, but as a mattress it gets caught on a cover or bedding. That said, it folds easily, is not difficult to move or carry, and the cleaning instructions for the cover are easy to follow. While it's for guests, my cats have stolen it.
customer_reviews.author: Megami Lee

customer_reviews.title: So far so good: ) I tested em out and pretty comfy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good :) I tested em out and pretty comfy
customer_reviews.author: Leigh A. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: worked excellent in our Subaru Forester
customer_reviews.text: we bought this for camping in the back of our Subaru Forester. With a little persuasion around the wheel wells, the full size fit our sleeping platform perfectly. the folding feature allowed us to travel with it folded in couch mode leaving space for us to pack the rest of our camping gear. once we got to our site, we pulled out our gear, folded the bed down and were set! we did not bottom out, no funky smells, slept like babies! we're never going back to a tent and air-mattresses again. highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K.

customer_reviews.title: Quality declined
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this foam chair four times over two years and the third and fourth items declined in quality from the first two items. The fourth item did not reach the size of my other three chairs of the same kind, so I returned it at considerable expense. I contacted the seller and have not received a response after three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: dcdad

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, high-quality, firm folding mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high-quality folding mattress. I've used it for guests sleeping on the floor, and we use it all the time as a "mini-couch" for my youngest son to sit on while we watch movies. Update: We've been using this regularly (both as cozy movie-watching seat and extra mattress for guests) for over a year now, and it's still like new-- very sturdily made. I even bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Joycocello

customer_reviews.title: The cover material is not worth the money The cover ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to own the product as I was expecting the great out of it. Since we have a 5 minths old baby, This sofa bed was supposed to be safe for him playing. For his sanitize purpose, we thought we couls wash the cover after reading the instruction carefully. It was said it was washable machine cold. Turned out I was so dissapointed, the cover material got torn up, and the zipper even broke. Very dissapointing. We are figuring the way out to return it. If you plan on not ever wash the cover, it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Zipper split
customer_reviews.text: I like the thickness and comfort. But upon setup, I found the zipper split on the middle cushion so I could not close it so I had white foam sticking out of the middle section. They suck all of the air out of the mattress to ship it in a nice slim box but once it is expanded, how do you return it? I emailed the company and told Amazon i wanted to return it but could not find a box big enough to return it. So now it is of no use.
customer_reviews.author: B. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: He slept on it for the first time over the Thanksgiving weekend and he said he loved it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my brother-in-law to use when he visits his daughter (it stays at her house); he's too large to sleep on a standard fold away cot (he's 6'6 / 400#++), therefore he needs something that doesn't have a frame he would most likely break. He slept on it for the first time over the Thanksgiving weekend and he said he loved it!! The 5 stars is coming from my Brother-in-law.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Griffin

customer_reviews.title: These are nice and comfortable as a mattress
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and comfortable as a mattress. I'm a fat guy and they were great BUT, my wife and I tried using two of them side by side and they would slide around the tent when we went camping. Some shelf liner on the bottom may help from the sliding. You could also use some Velcro to secure them together but the fabric will snag up from the Velcro pulling it. They are not that comfortable for an adult as a chair due to the proximity to the floor and the back not really being supportive. The other thing to think about is the Sheer Size. They are very large and difficult to haul.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great Quick Bed
customer_reviews.text: This sofa bed is great and quite comfortable. Plus my grandson loves playing on it. I'm giving it only 3 stars because I am still waiting to hear back from the company. My daughter in law needed to wash the covers due to a spill and the zipper broke on one of the cushions and is no longer usable. I messaged the company about a week ago regarding this issue and still haven't heard back from them. I usually don't have this issue with anything I buy from Amazon and am a little disappointed in the lack of communication.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Fold a way bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable bed for guests and I would have rated it higher but the zipper was broke when i unpacked it from the box. I didn’t have time to send it back and ask for a replacement because the guest was at the house. But it is a comfortable bed Update: I notified the company and they are sending me out a new cover🙂
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It’s really sort of eh for me. I knew what I was getting and I’m still a little disappointed. It’s not firm, if you sit on it for longer periods of time you can feel yourself slowly sink and there is minimal to no back relief. I ended up buying a bunch of pillows and a daybed frame. Might as well have spent the money on a real sofa/couch. I sleep on it occasionally and it’s not uncomfortable but definitely not something you want to use long term. Would recommend to parents who want a little reading area for toddlers but don’t want to give them a whole sofa in their room.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Stains won’t lift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the kids room so they can unfold to play on or fold and use as a little sofa. The Velcro isn’t very sturdy, so an adult wouldn’t be comfortable sitting back. The mesh fabric is awful for stains. No matter the detergent, stain remover, or oxyclean, the stain won’t budge. The cover is easy to remove and wash, just don’t expect it to come out perfectly clean. Knowing that it’s a kids couch, it’s bound to get messy. I wish this came in a different fabric. Also would be great about two inches thicker. My husband slept on it a couple of times to try it out for guests and didn’t find it super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Logan30

customer_reviews.title: Great firm bed
customer_reviews.text: This easy bed mattress is what I wanted. It's easy to manage and I like that it's firm. Im not a fan of memory foam or anything too soft. I been sleeping on it for a few days without issues. This is a great alternative to a full mattress with bedframes
customer_reviews.author: UnicornPoser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Chair/Bed
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my RV after removing an uncomfortable bottom bunk that took up too much space. Very comfortable as a chair and bed. Ordered a twin XL memory foam topper for sleeping. Works/looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Elsis

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE before unpacking! 19” tall and doesn’t hold its shape. Basically squatting down when sitting
customer_reviews.text: Once you take the mattress out of the box, it will be next to impossible to put it back in and UPS will charge about $100 to package it and ship it back. You will be relying on Amazon doing you a real solid and figuring something out. As for the review, the mattress doesn’t maintain its shape on its own when in seating position so it needs to be against a wall and is shorter than it appears to be in the pictures. When folded, a 5’10 adult is almost crouching down because it’s so short and it sinks in.
customer_reviews.author: Santi

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy- too thin and you feel floor through
customer_reviews.text: Competitors are much thicker and more supportive. Not worth buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: meeks777

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect! We needed something convenient for our babies room that we could sleep on when needed. I liked this idea because it serves several purposes justifying it's price for me. This offered the perfect firm/softness we needed as a bed. I'm 5'9 160lbs and have no issues with sinking to the ground as some others had mentioned (maybe it breaks down after several uses so I may update at some point). It works great as a low little couch for us and our son to sit on and read books. Our son also loves using it a a tumble mat too. All in all, a surprisingly great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: misssummerrose

customer_reviews.title: Worked but has liquid coming out of it
customer_reviews.text: It worked but then we found that liquid comes out of it
customer_reviews.author: vannesa mcmurray

customer_reviews.title: Space saving mattress
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was diagnosed with leukemia and after we got home from the hospital my husband and I wanted a mattress which was comfortable and extra long (husband is 6’6”) but which could be folded and put away. So far I’m the only one who has used the mattress but it’s been pretty comfortable. Beats sleeping on the floor (which I used to do). The firmness is great but I know different people like different levels of softness and firmness. This mattress lets me sleep in my daughter’s room and get a decent night’s rest.
customer_reviews.author: Sizzlingtree

customer_reviews.title: I love this foam mattress
customer_reviews.text: I love this foam mattress, I'm so glad I spent the money on it! We use it in our baby's room to sleep with him at night instead of having him in our room. It's relatively firm but not too firm. I have plenty of room length and width and I'd say the same for my husband who is 6'3".
customer_reviews.author: Laura Stingley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Practical!
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, comfortable to sleep or sit on, foam is firm enough for good back support, no smell from the cloth or foam, cloth cover unzips easily to remove for cleaning, packaged well for shipping and easy to open, takes up little space, perfect for occasional guests who aren't too demanding ("I must sleep in a bed!"), excellent for outdoor or indoor camping. Also, no need to worry about springs digging \into your back as in some futons after 6 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Govinda108

customer_reviews.title: and nice color. She has already had a friend sleep ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it for under my 11 yo daughter's new loft bed, and she loves sitting on it to read or play on her computer-- comfy and practical, and nice color. She has already had a friend sleep over on it who said it was very comfortable and she liked sleeping on it. The back is a tad shorter than I expected, but otherwise good. Be warned: it arrives looking like a rolled-up blanket but puffs out perfectly and great \edges and srtaight lines when it breathes out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: rkdoulou

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for temporary use
customer_reviews.text: For its design, it is a five star product; great idea. For temporary use such as guest staying over for 2 or 3 days, this would work out great. It is definitely more comfortable than sleeping in a narrow couch. However, it is too thin and does not support your body well. For the same reason, it is also uncomfortable to use it as a couch; you cannot sit up. The cover is also very flimsy and cannot take too much of a daily use. On the other hand, replacement covers are available for sale.
customer_reviews.author: BostonEngineer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, sturdy. Great for My teen boys room!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teen boys room, they are alwYs having friends over... it fits perfect! They love using iit as a chair to play games as well as a place to lay and relax on the floor. The cushion is nice and thick, the fabric is sturdy, I think even in these kids room, it will last a long time. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: brenpen05

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to get dirty
customer_reviews.text: First, I bought a full size, and then found that the zipper of the sofa was broken, so I asked the seller to return it, and then the seller returned it for me. Later, I bought another full size, and the zipper broke again after receiving it. I didn't ask for a refund this time, but in the process of using it, I found that the sofa was very dirty. As long as there were water drops on it, it felt very dirty, like oil stains! So the first quality is not very satisfactory!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good for my uses
customer_reviews.text: I have an 18 month old who loves us playing on the floor with her or sitting on the couch (which isn’t safe). This is the perfect addition to the play area. The only problem is the cover isn’t really a protective covering. It’s so porous any spills or crumbs go straight through. I added a fitted twin sheet and had to safety pin it underneath for it to stay fitted in the couch position but it looks good now.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Kuykendall

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. The versatility is great and it's pretty comfortable for anyone who weighs less than 180 lbs. I will say that the cover is pretty abrasive so I would definitely reccomend a good couple of sheets
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: sturdy flip bed. held up well for holiday house guests. adult (average size) slept on this for 6 nights. reported as surprisingly comfortable. easy to flip back into chair during the day. I added a thin foam mattress pad at night. Guest said this made it extra comfortable but probably not necessary. Used Twin XL fitted sheet. very satisfied with this purchase. have since used for 2 one night guests and both report a comfortable night
customer_reviews.author: pacificmom

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a extra spot for company to stay on. The cushion is thin and you can feel the floor right through it. Not impressed..
customer_reviews.author: Janaray

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable foldout couch
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for my new games room. I've been using it for several hours daily and have slept on it many times with 0 complaints. I read other reviews mentioning putting a comforter on top but this isn't a requirement for me. I really appreciate how easy it is to fold/unfold and it doesn't take up much space in couch form. I am considering putting a small cabinet beneath it while it's in couch mode so it can be elevated a bit off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: William Miller

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and perfect but can’t really clean urine or spilled liquids  out of it
customer_reviews.text: Great little couch thing perfect for what I was looking for for my toddler ! Only complaints are the Velcro strips should be either wayyy bigger or it should be snaps because it unvelcros itself when you go to lean back of you’re bigger than toddler size . Also the thing is pretty much impossible to clean if anything like let’s say pee gets inside so i really wish the outside washable cover was actually waterproof - but still breathable because that’s very important
customer_reviews.author: Se7en

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but impossible to clean- cheap zippers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my kids room. Firm enough for me to sit on comfortably and it rolls out into a nice sized bed for a guest. However....I changed this from 5 stars to 2 because we washed the cover and all the zippers broke off when we tried to put it back on...all of them. We rigged up something to pin it, but it looks like junk now. Sigh $100 wasted I would not buy again or recommend
customer_reviews.author: AZAsh

customer_reviews.title: Flat as a pancake
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed. I’ve had this thing unpacked for two days and it is still compressed. It looks nothing like the pictures on Amazon. Most definitely not worth $98.. Was really surprised since everyone said it was amazing and the real pictures that were posted even looked good. Not sure if I got a bad one or not.
customer_reviews.author: carolinagirl2heart

customer_reviews.title: Mattress is nice enough, couch could use some work.
customer_reviews.text: It makes a nice enough mattress for guests. Not super thick but enough cushion to get a good night's rest. I wish they sold a cover that covered it when in the couch formation. As it is, the couch shape is not very comfortable to sit on. It would make a good couch for kids but that's about it, and it is difficult to protect from my cat who loves to lie on there and cover it with filth so the protector would be nice. All in all, I'm very satisfied with this purchase compared with an inflatable mattress that would likely suffer a fatal wound at the hands of the cat.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for temporary use while our rescue pup recovers from surgery (cant jump on couch). Comfortable to sit on, but the back needs to lean against something for any support. I have it against a wall with additional pillows. I have slept on it for a few nights and it fits myself (5'1" female), my 40 lb pittie and 20 lb BT pup with her ecollar. No issues with space or discomcomfort while sleeping. This is a nice quality product for the price. Arrived on time and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought a high quality futon that was not cushy enough for me. I added this underneath, and I slept like heaven on the floor for over a month while I waited to get a new mattress for my bed. If you have ever wanted to try floor sleeping, or need a quick and ready guest bed, this is it folks. If I didn't already have a bed, I'd get a larger size and use as floor bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amalia

customer_reviews.title: It popped up perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The instruction said to leave it for 48 hours, I was so scared to step on them. I walked around it, even though it took up all of the floor space XD But it puffed up perfectly. It's not the most comfortable, but I had a spare queen sized pillow top and I put it on. It's pretty comfortable that way...though I think this is most likely due to the pillow top. It is pretty decent for the money as long as you manage your expectations. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wang

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok was this a joke? This looks just like cushions I just threw in the dumpster. It came rolled up like a rug. I thought they shipped it by accident. When we literally unrolled it we certainly didn’t find a mini futon!! It made us agitated, then laugh. Oh well. Too much of a hassle to figure out how they fit that in a box so we won’t be returning it. We’re chocking it up to a $100 mistake. Have NO idea how it gets so many stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lilliana

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I'm pregnant with twins right now and needed something to sleep on for about a month. Honestly, this mattress surprised me for how comfortable I can sleep on it. I added a quilted mattress topper to it, and I have a full body pillow with it, but I am currently sleeping as comfortable as I was on a normal bed. It's light enough for me to easily move it out of the way when I'm not using it, too. Overall I'm really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: andrew crawford

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Quality in a Portable Folding Mattress
customer_reviews.text: This foldable mattress serves a temporary need exceedingly well. It is very comfortable, firm yet giving, while adequately generous in width and length. A very good quality and value for the money and space.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for us
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect folding mattress for us. Our son really loves it and he’s been using it as his bed. It’s firm and not very soft but it’s what we were looking for. Plus, it’s made in the Philippines! I’m always very happy to have purchased something that was made in my country. ☺️ Pretty good bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: djaymichael

customer_reviews.title: Too hard for me to sleep on but perfect for my plans as a covered window seat
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Be warned however- it is quite firm! Too hard for me to sleep on but perfect for my plans as a covered window seat pad
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size, Super Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little fold up chair/bed for my daughter to sleep on because she often gets scared at night and having her in my bed is a miserable option for both of us. So now, when she gets scared at night, she can just come in my room, unfold the chair, and put herself to sleep. It's also great for when we have company sleeping in her room, or just for lounging around watching movies in the living room since our couch is pretty small. Really easy to fold back up- you can do it with one hand, and it's comfy for her as well. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my little Runaway Camper
customer_reviews.text: Firm but comfortable. I'm 5'11" and 245lbs. No problem side sleeping. Hips and shoulders don't bottom out. Very configurable. Fitted twin sheets stay on even when mattress is folded. Love it! See pictures and video.
customer_reviews.author: BamaBubba

customer_reviews.title: Foldable mattress? Yes plz
customer_reviews.text: Sooo me and my kids love this foldable sponge...they sit on it everyday to watch tv or play video games it is a tad small which was perfect for us anyhow since we got 2 toddlers i enjoy laying or sitting on it as well very comfy if ur thinking bout gettin it just get it its great thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: JRSerranoJr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent guest bed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for guest at Christmas. It's very comfortable. My 83 yr old mom even slept on it and says it's great. It looks very thin initially but after opening its about 4-5" deep. Buy a mattress cover from a self storage place or online to store for future.
customer_reviews.author: Plundered treasure

customer_reviews.title: Great spare bed; better than an air mattress any day
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed. I honestly can’t feel the difference in the morning when I sleep on this mattress...IM surprised by this because I am a very light and sensitive sleeper. However, the foam is just firm enough to make it feel like I’m in my own bed. I am very happy with my purchase. We use this at my boyfriends house to sleep In front of the fire place. I also take this car camping. So much easier to handle, despite its size than an. Air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Vanilla Quant

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than imagined.
customer_reviews.text: More comfortable than imagined. I'm a big guy and cant feel the floor through this mattress. A lot of these thin mattresses collapse and my hip bone feels like I'm directly on the floor. to accomplish this the mattress is very firm. If you don't like a firm mattress, you won't like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Humphries

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced. Cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheaply made piece of crap. It is way overpriced. I wouldn't feel so bad if i had paid 40$ for it but I paid over 100$ and am filled with disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased a queen size version of this, so I knew what I was getting. When I needed a twin size too, I almost cheaped out and got a different product, but so glad I stayed with this. Excellent and worth every penny. Comfortable & flexible, well made and pleasing texture on the cover. Stores well upright when not in use, though is somewhat cumbersome to move around. But hey: it's being solid and well constructed that makes it so good.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Faunch

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 18-year old son to sleep on during our one-month stay in our tiny hotel/apartment between houses. It is great looking (even matches the decor in the apartment), and comfortable as a bed or to sit on in the living room as extra seating during the day when we watch tv. This will be great for guests or to keep as a "couch" in my son's room in the new house.
customer_reviews.author: M. Haines

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and versatile.
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! I used it as a temporary mattress for about 6 or 7 weeks and I was super comfortable. Not once did I have trouble sleeping, not once did I wake up with back pain. It's also wide enough where you don't just roll off of it - unless you move a lot in your sleep. Now I am using it as a little couch in my bedroom, as well as a meditation cushion. Its height is perfect for comfortably meditating on without feeling like I'm sitting in a chair.
customer_reviews.author: Welmis Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Suits my desired purpose
customer_reviews.text: It's a little bit stiffer than I thought it would be but it's comfortable to sleep on and fits what I wanted it for. I needed a temporary bed for about six months and it's been more than satisfactory for the few months I've been using it. Also, without a lot of effort it's easy to throw into the back of my mini van and turn it into a camper.
customer_reviews.author: lee gregory

customer_reviews.title: Not like the picture
customer_reviews.text: It’s is much thinner than pictures. It does not have sharp corners and sharp straight lines, like the picture. It look likes a elephant has been sitting on it for months and the foam has thinned our.
customer_reviews.author: Rami

customer_reviews.title: Milliard mattresses are consistently great products!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about my couch/mattress. We actually bought it to use a a couch/bed in our Cargo Trailer that we converted. I works wonderful, looks great, and very comfortable. We have bought the Tri-fold queen, the small crib, standard crib, and toddler bed. Every product is well made and durable. Wish that Milliard made full size mattresses too!
customer_reviews.author: Julie E - Vacaville, CA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: When we took the mattress out of the box, I thought, "oh, no! What a rip off. It's so flat!" But we followed the directions about letting it expand, and we were amazed to watch the memory foam expand over the first 48 hours. It is wider than similar beds we have had. Our grandson declared it super comfy. Totally pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids LOVE this thing
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this thing. The 1 year old and 3 year old love that it's the perfect size for them to get on and off without help. When the 3 year old feels jumpy she knows she can land on this "couch" quietly. The covers can be machine washed, which is a huge boon with kids. Putting it back on is not difficult as long as you remember which of the smaller foam pads goes on top and note that there's a slight angle on them.
customer_reviews.author: Linh D.

customer_reviews.title: ... got one of these chairs to start is it’s great. It expanded fully within an hour and my ...
customer_reviews.text: We got one of these chairs to start is it’s great. It expanded fully within an hour and my kids loved it. If our only experience was that one I would have given five stars. But we ordered a second and it never inflated beyond about half way. Discussed with amazon and was able to get it replaced. The third is also great and expanded fully. These are perfect for your playroom. My kids can sit on them, lay on them, or use them for building forts.
customer_reviews.author: SarahO

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Layers thinner than it looks
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a lot shorter than it looks in the picture. I use it when I sleep on the floor but it doesn't really help much due to the layers not being thick enough. Do not buy this. Not worth the money and returning it is out of the question because once it inflates theres no way to get it into a box to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Aii Dee

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to sleep on
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for company to use when they come to visit. I was the one to use it though. I had to put a blanket down on it because the material is a little rough. But it is very comfortable to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Worst designed zipper I've seen in awhile
customer_reviews.text: Worst designed zipper I've seen in awhile. There is a flap under it that by design is destined to get stuck in it. It's fine otherwise but don't bother trying to wash it because using the zipper is a nightmare and eventually it got to a point where it's not even possible to move the zipper so it's half open now
customer_reviews.author: Joey O

customer_reviews.title: Washable cover
customer_reviews.text: It was great purchase. It’s an idea furniture for our basement that is a lounge area/ guest room. Wish the travel bag was already came with it. The cover comes off to wash so that’s great.
customer_reviews.author: G-dog

customer_reviews.title: Quality, comfort, and convenience
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for my parents and they love it. It suits their needs and more. Our toddler gets use out of it when she visits her Grandparengs and it works as an extra bed for guests. It’s held up nicely after 6 months. Still looks as great as it did brand new. We love it so much I’ve purchased a second for our house. Whenever our daughter is sick I can easily and comfortably sleep with her in her room. It gets moved to the family room for her sleepovers, etc. We highly recommend this portable folding bed/chair.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: It’s big and Confty..!!!! I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: My mother in law love It she is an expert on that. She has try few and she said this is the best from all.
customer_reviews.author: lanny machado

customer_reviews.title: Love this mattress
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress. I have this under my Japanese futon, and it provides enough support so I don't feel like my bones are touching the floor. Would highly recommend for anyone who doesn't want to deal with a box spring and going for the minimalist look.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf Mibu

customer_reviews.title: Happy boy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our young son's room and he is delighted with it. One of our granddaughters slept on over the weekend and said it slept well It expanded quickly, cover fits well. Iu seems to be well made and the foam seems to be substantial. The cover could be a bit softer and I think de ssf pite it's dark color will stain easily The plan is to keep it covered with an extra long sheet and it will still fold up with the sheet on Not sure how well material will hold up.in washer. Will likely wash fully zipped by itself and line dry for best results
customer_reviews.author: zoe.k.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dog Steps- multifunctional Tri bed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bed for guests and I started searching online. To my surpise I discovered a firm plus comfortable staircase for my older dog. Plus it's a great bed for her and my guest. The covers are washable. My Furry Angel loves it more than I do.
customer_reviews.author: Salty

customer_reviews.title: It's super compressed, hopefully it fills out... You get what you pay for... It's a good topper
customer_reviews.text: I don't like how thin this compresses to... I will sleep in this for a night or two with my existing foam bedding and update this as necessary
customer_reviews.author: Martonic

customer_reviews.title: Great for kid's room, play room, or game room
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 11 year old's bedroom for him for Christmas. He loves it. When folded up, it isn't super high, but works well for two kids to sit on and play on their phones or hang out. When unfolded it makes a great little bed for an overnight guest. It is basically foam covered in a mesh type material.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Minnich

customer_reviews.title: XL  twin size is wonderful compared to standard twin size.
customer_reviews.text: This is really comfortable to lay or sit on. Excellent value exactly as described. Extra large twin is a great size. Plenty of room to stretch when laid out and room for my 50 lb dog to curl up beside me when using as a chair. I agree with other reviewers that the cover is scratchy so I rated it 4 stars. It also makes a great floor mat for exercise. Right now I have the backrest down so to is two layers and put a bean bag chair on top. This makes the bean bag a perfect height for me. I would love to make a platform so this is at chair height when folded.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great as bed, ok as chair.
customer_reviews.text: It is not quite as perfectly shaped as in the picture....... it doesnt work perfectly as a loveseat but, it works much better than I expected as a quick bed. Really comfortable to sleep on, even for an adult. I needed two but bought one as a test. I will be ordering a second one today.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a fold out bed, wouldn't be much of a chair though. I laid on it briefly and it was surprisingly comfortable. I like it is as wide as a twin mattress and as long as a king. Some of these are awfully narrow, this can comfortably accommodate an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but seller should tell foam will inflate.
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is fine, comfortable and easily adjustable. Seller should tell in the posting that the foams can float. It surprised me when I got it as it was rolled in a box with 1x1-sqr-ft top. At first, I thought I was tricked by the seller or the foams were missing. I almost requested to return it. Later, after unpacked it, i saw instructions in the package and i unzipped the cover and left the foams out of its cover for 2 days. The foam expanded as shown in the posting.
customer_reviews.author: Worawut W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my doggy stairs!
customer_reviews.text: The main intended daily use for this has played out quite well. My smallest dog uses this to hop up onto our bed. For that purpose it is perfectly suited and used daily. I had also hoped to use it occasionally myself as an outdoor mattress, but, the material is very coarse and not at all good against the skin. I still consider this to be a great purchase though.
customer_reviews.author: Randifer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sofa, acceptably comfortable mattress
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about ordering something uncomfortable since it’s after all a folding mattress so I didn’t expect it to compare to a regular mattress. It’s very comfortable as a sofa which was a relief considering the back support being shaped a bit oddly. As a mattress it feels a tiny bit thin but as someone who likes hard beds that is no problem. I’m overall pretty happy with it. I wish there were bedsheets that could fit well over the mattress, but oh well. It will have to do with bunched up sheets under the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: S Jang

customer_reviews.title: he used it for the first time last night and said it was nice, it was thick enough so that he didn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband travels to Seattle to work and lives in a boat while he’s there, he used it for the first time last night and said it was nice, it was thick enough so that he didn’t feel like he was sleeping on the hard bunk beneath the pad. He’s pretty happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Kershner

customer_reviews.title: It is firm and seems comfortable when I tested it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a spare bed so haven't actually slept on it. It is firm and seems comfortable when I tested it. I am happy with this purchase,, beats a blow up mattress any day.Having company in a few weeks will update after this.
customer_reviews.author: mary berghuis

customer_reviews.title: A very pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to sleep on while he's visiting. That sounds normal, but he's 6'7"and about 240#. He actually fits and it's comfortable for him. He said he wished his bed was as comfortable. I initially thought it would be too thin, but it holds up great.
customer_reviews.author: Quality seeker

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on a cement floor in the basement when my kids visit. They love it...always say how comfortable it is and you would never guess it's directly on a cement floor. It folds up for easy storage. By the way one of my "kids" weights over 240 pounds and he says he is extremely comfortable on this pad.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Good solution for me
customer_reviews.text: I needed a "mattress" to make my sofa bed more comfortable. This one does the trick although it might be a little firm for some people. What I like most about it is that when I'm not using it as a mattress, it folds to look like a chair and can be used as a chair. The other folding mattress I had just folded into a square and was unattractive.
customer_reviews.author: SET2011

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use as a temporary bed while my dog is very ill. I do not want her to be alone and she can no longer safely sleep on traditional bedding. This thing is perfect. I rest well and it folds up every morning easily. I love it
customer_reviews.author: weizer parker

customer_reviews.title: My guests love this.
customer_reviews.text: My guest loves this. The one that I got only fits one person (my mistake for buying a size smaller than what I wanted). I love how you can fold it into a chair and actually be useful when you don't need it for a mattress. We have this for a while now and the foam is still really good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Mao

customer_reviews.title: Very good sofa bed.
customer_reviews.text: The problem I had was delivery but got it on 2nD delivery date. The packaging was very good. The product itself exceeded my expectations. I am very happy with the folding sofa as well a s the covering. In fact I will be ordering another in a couple of weeks..
customer_reviews.author: rpaulette rowand

customer_reviews.title: Excellent as extra bed
customer_reviews.text: My adult son slept on this in Twin Long for 10 days and says it was great... very comfortable for good sized male. UPDATE: Many guests have slept on it and all have loved it. Not much of a chair, but a great guest bed.
customer_reviews.author: Big-Z

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband just loves this. It’s very comfortable to sleep on. Would make a great guest bed.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Miziz Uylengco

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this so when my little one came into my bed I could either lay him down on it or I can myself lay on it. I did not expect it to be more comfortable than my bed and now I am laying on this on my bedroom floor almost every night lol
customer_reviews.author: tian.fitty

customer_reviews.title: Works for me better then I expected..
customer_reviews.text: Better then I expected.. came vacuum sealed it took shape right away after opening it's more on the firm side comfortable to me I side sleep just what I was hoping for.. I'll just be using for camping.. I slept on it the first night to test it out was fine.. I'll be keeping it I also ordered the carrying case for it very awkward to carry makes it a lot easier and keeps it clean...
customer_reviews.author: dawg

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: This tri-fold folding mattress turned out to be exactly what I need. I bought it for visits from my 8 year old grandson to our beach condo. It will work for him and I even slept on it once and it's perfect for an adult as well. I would highly recommend this product for sleeping as well as sitting playing video games or watching TV. Plus it sits in the corner nicely when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Betty M

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great for kids room
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for the kids bedroom as an extra bed for guests or when I needed to sleep in the room. Way more convenient than an air mattress and if the baby gets sick I can quickly set it up without a lot of noise or fuss and sleep next to the crib comfortably. The kids climb and play all over it as a chair and it has held up great. Definitely a good buy and will probably purchase a second one for another room. Used a twin fitted sheet on it for a guest and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Streem

customer_reviews.title: LOve this product
customer_reviews.text: LOve this product..it is much larger than I expected..almost a full size bed in width and length and extremely comfortable. Folds up nicely for a seat to sit on and watch TV or read..My daughter loves this and wants to sleep on it and not her bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A very useful bed/couch. While it sits a bit low to the floor as a couch, it makes a very comfy bed when you put a sheet on it. I use it as a seat on my actual bed in my room for back support while gaming or watching movies.
customer_reviews.author: Fenix

customer_reviews.title: sad to say i sleep on this most nights in ...
customer_reviews.text: sad to say i sleep on this most nights in my baby's room, but it beats the floor when I am so tired! thick enough for comfort, but folds up like a toddler couch. happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: msrae

customer_reviews.title: Solid and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Solid and supportive foam and large enough to be a children's loveseat. In my children's living room for watching movies and gaming. One of them has already claimed it as theirs. Will also be useful in the event of sleepovers.
customer_reviews.author: El Stevo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: The futon is a memory foam thick enough so that your body won't sink to the flooring and feel the hardness of the floor. It's pretty comfortable. I really like it. It's light, the material is quality, and the whole futon is sturdy enough and can tote anywhere. The price is $114 plus tax, and when shopping I thought it was too expensive, but when I saw the quality, I became satisfied. It's a great product overall and the product arrived in just a few days from the promised 6 days delivery time. I am well pleased!
customer_reviews.author: chill11

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to sleep on at our daughter's house and it is the perfect size for me and my husband. He thinks it's more comfortable than our bed but I wouldn't go that far. It is good for a couple nights, nice and firm. The best part is that it folds into a small couch/love seat that our granddaughter loved to sit and nap on. The fur grandbabies loved it too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kid couch to adult sized mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little toddler couch that unfolds into a mattress big enough for an adult! However, it is a bit soft. We wish it was a little more firm to support an adult body.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D. Anderson

product_meta.title: Milliard Tri-Fold Foam Folding Mattress and Sofa Bed for Guests (Full) (Blue)
feature_bullets: Simple, but elegant alternative when large sofa beds aren't an option.
Great for apartment dwellers, college dorms, family dens and when your traveling or anywhere else space is limited.
Great for Video gaming, reading a book or camping and of course sleeping. Includes a removable and machine-washable soft cover!
Made out of CertiPUR Certified high density Foam so your bed dosn't sag and is light and portable enough for use while travelling.
Size: 78"x52"x4" (Full). Storage Dimensions are 52"x29"x14 which makes it easy to store in tight spaces.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars120 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
